name: rison-node
author: Nanonid (https://github.com/Nanonid)
description: data serialization format optimized for compactness in URIs

scripts.clean: if [ -d build ]; then rm -r build; fi
scripts.build: npm run clean; mkdir build; (echo 'var rison = {};'; cat js/rison.js; echo 'return rison;') | umd rison > build/rison.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run build
